triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The survey integrates reinforcement learning with planning for MDP optimization.

triples.name: Markov decision process
triples.relevance: MDP is the formal framework for sequential decision-making problems addressed by model-based RL.

triples.name: Automated planning and scheduling
triples.relevance: Planning is a core component of model-based RL that integrates with learning for MDP optimization.

triples.name: Transfer learning
triples.relevance: Transfer learning is discussed as a related RL field that benefits from model-based approaches.

triples.name: Sequential decision making
triples.relevance: Sequential decision making is the core problem that model-based RL aims to solve through MDP optimization.
